title: Is it free to switch energy suppliers?
content: Yep, it's 100% free and we take care of your energy switch for you. Once we know the details of your current energy supply, we'll find you a better deal in seconds. BillBuddy is completely free, and it always will be.

title: How long does it take to switch energy suppliers?
content: We can set up your energy switch in a matter of minutes, and once we've set everything up for you it typically takes between 2-3 weeks for the switch to be complete. Don't worry - there will never be any interruption to your energy supply.

title: Can I switch my energy supplier whenever I like?
content: Absolutely - you're never tied to one supplier, even if you're in a contract with them. If you've not switched your energy supplier in the past 12 months, the chances are that you've significantly overpaying. Even if you have switched recently, it's worth checking to see if you could save even more by switching to a better deal early.
